name: @guidesmiths/react-form-creator
description: React from creator using json schema
author: Guidesmiths

scripts.release:patch: git tag -l | xargs git tag -d && changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: git tag -l | xargs git tag -d && changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:major: git tag -l | xargs git tag -d && changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version major && git push origin && git push origin --tags
